descriptions:
Invite backyard charm and help local wildlife thrive with our handcrafted Squirrel House/Nesting Box. Built from aromatic, weather-resistant cedar wood, this sturdy refuge is designed for years of outdoor use. Each box is both glued and nailed for extra durability, then finished with a beautiful, hand-burned squirrel illustration by artist Drew Senesac that adds a warm, rustic touch to your garden.

Thoughtful design makes care simple. The removable roof provides quick access for seasonal cleaning or nest checks, and two pre-drilled mounting holes make installation easy. We include two screws and two washers, so you have everything you need to hang it right away.

Sized for comfort and safety, the 3.5-inch entrance welcomes neighborhood squirrels while helping deter larger predators. Outside dimensions are 12 x 11 x 10 inches, with a cozy interior (5.75 x 9 inches) that’s ideal for nesting and shelter throughout the year.

Why you’ll love it:
- Premium cedar wood: Naturally resistant to rot and insects.
- Built to last: Glued and nailed construction for extra strength.
- Artist detail: Burned squirrel artwork by Drew Senesac elevates any outdoor space.
- Easy maintenance: Removable roof for fast, stress-free cleaning.
- Ready to mount: Pre-drilled holes plus included screws and washers.
- Wildlife-friendly sizing: 3.5-inch opening designed for squirrel comfort and safety.

Create a welcoming haven for your backyard visitors and enjoy the lively presence of squirrels season after season with this handsome, ready-to-hang nesting box.
